description: Payment OS for the Agent Economy - Non-custodial MPC wallets with natural language spending policies for AI agents. Supports 5 chains, virtual cards, and 5 payment protocols (AP2, TAP, UCP, A2A, x402).
rules: Use AsyncSardisClient for async Python SDK operations
Use SardisClient for sync Python SDK operations
MCP server runs with: npx @sardis/mcp-server start
No API key needed for simulated/sandbox mode
All transactions are policy-checked before execution
Supported tokens: USDC, USDT, EURC, PYUSD (stablecoins only)
